word: WHY DID SHE READ ANY OF THESE BOOKS? THE GREAT EVENTS OF THE CONFLICT OF THE AGES AS BROUGHT OUT IN THE GREAT CONTROVERSY [I.E., CONFLICT] SERIES, WERE PRESENTED TO HER IN PART AT MANY DIFFERENT TIMES. IN THE FIRST PRESENTATION A BRIEF OUTLINE WAS GIVEN HER AS REPRESENTED IN THE THIRD SECTION OF THE BOOK NOW CALLED EARLY WRITINGS.
